amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 115-815 to amend Sec. 1503 to include a list of foreign state or foreign nonstate actors involved in the threats to election campaigns for Federal offices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schneider amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Schneider.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schneider amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
